      • transformSourceAsMap

        public Map<String,Object> transformSourceAsMap(Map<String,Object> sourceAsMap)
        Transform the source when it is expressed as a map. This is public so it can be transformed the source is loaded.
        Parameters:
        sourceAsMap - source to transform. This may be mutated by the script.
        Returns:
        transformed version of transformMe. This may actually be the same object as sourceAsMap
